text: 6:6 1 Timoti 4:12E arazir Godɨn damazimɨn zuezibagh amua, guizɨn akamɨn fofozimɨn suira. E akamadariba ikarvagha bemɨram atarir puvatɨ. E arazir aghuibar gumazamizibagh ami. E Godɨn Duamɨn gavgavim iti. E igharaz darazigh ifongezir arazim guizbangɨram a gami. E arazir kabagh amua kamaghɨn ian aka, e guizbangɨra Godɨn ingangarir gumazamiziba.
